title: Lead Axe
summaries: The Lead Axe is an early game axe, stronger than the starting Copper Axe and weaker than the Silver or Tungsten Axe. It has an alternate ore version, the Iron Axe, which is slightly weaker. Like all axes, it is used to cut down trees, cacti and Giant Glowing Mushrooms.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Sell: 480
